metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39318 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: FreeRDP is a free remote desktop protocol library and clients. Affectedversions of FreeRDP are missing input validation in `urbdrc` channel. Amalicious server can trick a FreeRDP based client to crash with division byzero. This issue has been addressed in version 2.9.0. All users are advisedto upgrade. Users unable to upgrade should not use the `/usb` redirectionswitch.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
